description: StaticPodOperatorStatus is status for controllers that manage static pods.  There are different needs because individual node status must be tracked.

conditions.description: conditions is a list of conditions and their status

items.description: OperatorCondition is just the standard condition fields.

lastTransitionTime.description: Time is a wrapper around time.Time which supports correct marshaling to YAML and JSON.  Wrappers are provided for many of the factory methods that the time package offers.

generations.description: generations are used to determine when an item needs to be reconciled or has changed in a way that needs a reaction.

items.description: GenerationStatus keeps track of the generation for a given resource so that decisions about forced updates can be made.

group.description: group is the group of the thing you're tracking

hash.description: hash is an optional field set for resources without generation that are content sensitive like secrets and configmaps

lastGeneration.description: lastGeneration is the last generation of the workload controller involved

name.description: name is the name of the thing you're tracking

namespace.description: namespace is where the thing you're tracking is

resource.description: resource is the resource type of the thing you're tracking

latestAvailableRevision.description: latestAvailableRevision is the deploymentID of the most recent deployment

latestAvailableRevisionReason.description: latestAvailableRevisionReason describe the detailed reason for the most recent deployment

nodeStatuses.description: nodeStatuses track the deployment values and errors across individual nodes

items.description: NodeStatus provides information about the current state of a particular node managed by this operator.

currentRevision.description: currentRevision is the generation of the most recently successful deployment

lastFailedCount.description: lastFailedCount is how often the installer pod of the last failed revision failed.

lastFailedReason.description: lastFailedReason is a machine readable failure reason string.

lastFailedRevision.description: lastFailedRevision is the generation of the deployment we tried and failed to deploy.

lastFailedRevisionErrors.description: lastFailedRevisionErrors is a list of human readable errors during the failed deployment referenced in lastFailedRevision.

lastFailedTime.description: Time is a wrapper around time.Time which supports correct marshaling to YAML and JSON.  Wrappers are provided for many of the factory methods that the time package offers.

lastFallbackCount.description: lastFallbackCount is how often a fallback to a previous revision happened.

nodeName.description: nodeName is the name of the node

targetRevision.description: targetRevision is the generation of the deployment we're trying to apply

observedGeneration.description: observedGeneration is the last generation change you've dealt with

readyReplicas.description: readyReplicas indicates how many replicas are ready and at the desired state

version.description: version is the level this availability applies to
